cmp: 包 (to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/to contract (to or for))
mng: carpenter's plane, to plane (woodwork), to shave off, to peel (with a potato peeler etc)
a carpenter's plane, to plane, to level, to make smooth
to dig, to excavate, (coll.) to exclude, not to count, to deduct, to subtract

exm.mng: shaved or crushed ice dessert or beverage
to dig up roots and inquire at the base (idiom); to get to the bottom of sth
lit. to dig up the root, to get to the heart of (the matter)
